mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `deploy_global_param` (id, name, display_name, description, fcu, fcd, lcu, lcd) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{displayName}, #{description}, #{fcu}, now(3), #{lcu}, now(3)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{name}, display_name = #{displayName}, description = #{description}, lcu = #{lcu}, lcd = now(3)
mapper.select: select id, name, display_name as displayName, description, fcu, fcd, lcu, lcd from deploy_global_param where id = #{value}
mapper.sql:
from deploy_global_param
and (`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR `display_name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR `description` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%'))
